Sword of Life Stealing

Weapon Enchantment +2

Life Stealing Critical: On a Critical Hit, the target takes an extra 1-10 Necrotic damage as long as it isn't a construct or an undead. You also gain 10 temporary hit points.

Crimson Mischief

Weapon Enchantment +2

Prey Upon the Weak: This weapon deals an additional ld4 Piercing damage against targets with 50% of their hit points or fewer.
